CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 22, 1955, pg. 5 reads: "Vandals Left Mark - Graham L. Anderson, retired real estate broker formerly of Homewood, points to the spot on his rear porch where vandals about six months ago left a package of human waste and dashed away as Anderson fired to shots into the air."
TitMainTitle: Graham L. Anderson, standing on steps of his small porch pointing to location of vandalism, 3903 Foster Road, North Versailles
